game module¶

class game.Game(wheel, table)¶

Bases: object

Class to perform simulation of a game of roulette

cycle(player)¶

simulates a single round of single player roulette 1 player places its bets 2 game fetches the winning outcomes from a single spin of the wheel 3 game updates player balances based on the outcome being a winning or losing outcome.

Parameters:player – (Passenger57)
